review: Overall a very good experience due to friendly nature and problem resolving ability of the doctor.The waiting time was minimum and the appointment time was honoured.The fees is quite nominal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is friendly.....listens patiently.....Scan service is also available.....scan was done immediately and was told to be normal.....i am happy with d services provided.....pharmacy and lab services are also available.... Got blood investigations done.....am happy that everything s done at the same visit....

doctor just wants to check reports and base her diagnosis wholly on reports. she first send us to do ultrasound. when that report came normal then she started asking us to do ct scan. when i asked what's your diagnosis telling her answer was i can't say anything without looking at the report. disappointing response. if reports tell everything then what's the value of a doctor's experience.

review: Dr.  Explains very clearly &  we are feeling like family friend when she advise about particular condition. Totally we are fully satisfied  with doctor's treatment & consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had visited the doctor for less baby's movement.....doctor counselled us well....did the scan immediately and told baby s fine....lab and pharmacy services are also available...so made use of it.... totally very happy with the services provided....
